summary: Six lore-friendly tattoo overlays for RaceMenu.
descriptionHtml:
[u]DESCRIPTION[/u]
 
A set of six lore-friendly tattoos as Racemenu Overlays.


3.0 Contains:

1. Three Stormcloak-themed tattoos
[list]
[*]One back
[*]One right thigh
[*]One pubic
[/list]
2. Eight Daedric/Conjuration themed tattoos
[list]
[*]Four chest, including a split version of the Sanguine Rose chest tattoo to allow the flower to be colored differently from the stem!
[*]Two pubic
[*]One back
[*]One right arm
[/list]
3. Two Imperial-themed tattoos
[list]
[*]One back
[*]One pubic
[/list]
4. Three Dunmer-themed tattoos
[list]
[*]One back
[*]One thigh
[*]One chest
[/list]
5. One Dark Brotherhood themed tattoo
[list]
[*]Left shoulder/upper arm
[/list]
6. Fourteen birthsign-themed tattoos
[list]
[*]One for each of the thirteen birthsigns
[*]An all-in-one combined birthsign tattoo
[/list]
Individual birthsign locations are identical to those shown on the all-in-one previews.
 
All are fully colorable and available in 4k and 2k resolution!
 
All were built and tested on a UNP texture/body. The chest tattoo tends to look better on smaller chests, but it's fine on something 7B-sized too. I can't make any promises at sizes larger than that. They are somewhat compatible with CBBE - original tattoos are tested, 2.0 additions are not.

 
[u]FUTURE PLANS[/u]

If I get struck by inspiration and add more, I'll update this mod, but there are no concrete plans to expand it at this time. It's really hard to account for texture warping when you're basically just slapping png's onto a texture and really time-consuming to tweak them to look okay, so I won't be doing big additions like full torso tattoos or anything, probably just more like is already contained.

 
DISCLAIMER: I am not an artist.
author: Jexsam

files.name: Jexsam's Lore Tattoos 3.0
files.changelogHtml:
Added three unique new tattoos
Added a split version of the Sanguine Rose chest tattoo to allow the flower to be colored differently from the stem and flairs.
